name: GunVsMagic
description:
Description

This is a short game that has a silly story in it. You'll be brought to an unexpected story with an aesthetic dungeon environment.You play as a blue knight who is already armed, is the weapon a sword? Of course not, you will be armed with a firearm. Want
to know more about the game? Then play it.

ControlKeyDescriptionW / A / S / D
Move The Character
Right Mouse Button
ShootQ / E
Change Weapons
RReloadCredits
  • Dungeon TileSet : https://0x72.itch.io/ and https://o-lobster.itch.io/
  • Background : https://ansimuz.itch.io/space-background
  • Soundtrack : https://opengameart.org/content/adventure-begins
